mapper.delete: update gg_sswpxx_zpxx set isdel = 1,XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()) where wpid = '${wpid}'
update gg_sswpxx_zpxx set isdel = 1,XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()) where biz_id = '${bizId}'
mapper.insert: insert into gg_sswpxx_zpxx (id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, rybh, wpid, biz_id, zplx) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update gg_sswpxx_zpxx set isdel = #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, data_flag = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, lrr_sfzh = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lrsj = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgr_sfzh = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xgsj = #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, baqid = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baqmc = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rybh = #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wpid = #{wpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, biz_id = #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zplx = #{zplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, rybh, wpid, biz_id, zplx from gg_sswpxx_zpxx where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, rybh, wpid, biz_id, zplx from gg_sswpxx_zpxx where 1 = 1 and isdel = 0
and wpid = '${wpid}'
and rybh = '${rybh}'
and zplx = '${zplx}'
select * from gg_sswpxx_zpxx where biz_id = '${bizId}' and isdel = 0
